CommentText: Contacted customer to get more details about the bitter taste. Requested a sample of the affected batch.
Received sample from customer. Forwarding to Quality Control for analysis.
Quality Control analysis complete. Found slight over-roasting in the batch. Recommending adjustment to roasting time.
Provided customer with our bulk order discount structure. Awaiting their decision.
Customer placed a bulk order. Processed with applicable discounts.
Scheduled a virtual training session for next week. Sent preparatory materials to the customer.
Conducted virtual training session. Customer had additional questions about maintenance.
Sent follow-up email with maintenance guide and offered additional support if needed.
Checked with logistics team. Shipment delayed due to weather conditions.
Updated customer about the delay. Offered expedited shipping once weather clears.
Weather cleared. Shipment sent with expedited service at no extra cost to customer.
Provided detailed information about our coffee sourcing and roasting process.
Customer requested additional information about fair trade practices. Forwarding to our sourcing team.
Sent comprehensive document about our fair trade practices and sustainability efforts.
Sent digital product catalog and current pricing information to the customer.
Customer asked about customization options. Discussing with our production team.
Identified issue with payment processing module. Escalated to IT team.
Fixed payment processing bug. System now operational.
Confirmed with customer that online ordering is now working correctly.
Discussed custom blend requirements with customer. Forwarding to our master roaster.
Developed sample custom blend. Sending to customer for approval.
Customer approved blend. Scheduling production for next week.
Provided information about our current sustainable packaging options.
Customer interested in compostable bags. Checking availability with our suppliers.
Confirmed availability of compostable bags. Updating customer and adjusting their next order.
Arranged for pickup of defective grinder. Sending replacement unit.
Replacement grinder delivered. Confirming with customer that it's working correctly.
Customer confirmed new grinder is functioning well. Closing ticket.
Scheduled on-site barista training session for next week.
Conducted training session. Customer requested follow-up on latte art techniques.
Sent video tutorial on advanced latte art techniques. Offered another session if needed.
Provided general guidelines for coffee storage. Recommending specific containers.
Investigated order fulfillment error. Found mislabeling issue in warehouse.
Corrected customer's order and expedited shipping. Offered discount on next purchase.
Customer received correct order and accepted discount. Apologized for inconvenience.
Scheduled maintenance visit for next week. Sent preparation checklist to customer.
Performed on-site maintenance. Recommended replacement of worn parts.
Customer approved parts replacement. Ordering parts and scheduling follow-up visit.
Provided information about our upcoming winter blend and holiday specials.
Customer interested in bulk order of winter blend. Calculating custom pricing.
Sent custom quote for bulk winter blend order. Awaiting customer's decision.
